'''Discerner of Enigmas''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Valley Orchid" [[Yelan]] ({{Hydro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* All occurrences of this Wish Series have run alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Aqua Simulacra]], a weapon tailored to Yelan's gameplay mechanics.
